thread.title: Speed skating club opening its doors

title: Speed skating club opening its doors
text:
Speed skating club opening its doors By: Perry Bergson Enlarge Image 
The Westman Speed Skating Club will hold an open house tonight at the Sportsplex. (FILE PHOTO) 
"It’s just an opportunity for people to get exposed to the sport of short-track speedskating and to see if they would be interested in taking up the sport," 
"We have skaters who skate very competitively, we have skaters who have been to national championships in the last two years and we have recreational skaters as well," 
He said the open house reflects the sport’ 
"We get a lot of young kids, we get multiple-kid families come out because it’s a mixed gender sport," Charles said. "We have lots of families who come out with two or three kids. Because it’s mixed gender, it’s great for them. They can all get involved and aren’t running to two or three different activities. It’s an activity that they all can participate in. 
He added it’s important to have the open house because the sport doesn’
